fr.liglab.adele.icasa.simulator.listener.util

Class BaseZoneListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.liglab.adele.icasa.simulator.listener.util.BaseZoneListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IcasaListener, ZoneListener, ZonePropListener

    public class BaseZoneListener
extends Object
implements ZoneListener
    Empty implementation of a zone listener. This is class is intended to ease implementation of Zone Listeners.
    Author:
    Gabriel Pedraza Ferreira
